findAllMethods

public java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Method> findAllMethods(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)

findAllMembers

public java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Member> findAllMembers(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
Gets all members from a class and its superclasses.

The members are sorted from superclass to subclass, with fields and methods in the superclass first, then fields and methods in subclasses.

Parameters:
clazz - The class to find the members in.
Returns:
List with all the members found.

isOverridden

public boolean isOverridden(java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                            java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Method> candidates)

isOverridden

public boolean isOverridden(java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                            java.lang.reflect.Method candidate)
Checks if a method has been overridden by a candidate.

Rules for overriding:

  • Candidate must be in a subclass of the class with method.
  • The method names must be the same.
  • The parameters must be the same.
  • The return type must be the same or a subclass.
  • Access modifier must be same or less restrictive.
  • Method can not be private, final or static.
  • Candidate can not be private or static.
  • Candidate must be in the same package as a method with default access.

Parameters:
method - The method that will be checked if it's been overridden.
candidate - The method to check if it's overriding.
Returns:
If method has been overridden by candidate.
